Name: Rony Paul
description:
Rony, 27, lives in the community of Moral with his partner and their 2 children. The family lives in a small house owned by a relative that has been lent to them, so that they do not have to pay for a rental.

Upon becoming a father and having the responsibility of providing for the well-being of his family, Rony looked for a way to support the household. With some initial savings, he started to cultivate potatoes, and this activity has given him a good income. This is why Rony has decided to continue with this type of work and expand his production. However, to do this, he needs a bigger investment of capital. This is why he is requesting a loan to buy seeds, chemical and organic fertilizers, and other agricultural supplies. In this way, he hope to improve his farming activity so that he can generate more profits.
